title: The Winter Olympics in Italy: A Fun Sports Event
summary: The Winter Olympics are happening in Italy in 2026, and it's a big sports event with athletes from many countries. Over 2,900 athletes will compete in snow and ice sports for 16 days. The games are in different places in northern Italy, like Milan and Cortina. The opening ceremony starts on Friday at a stadium in Milan, with singers like Mariah Carey performing. Great Britain has athletes carrying the flag, and they hope to win more medals than before. The BBC will show the games on TV and online. This event is exciting because it brings people together to watch sports.
